Third Party Notices | Pix Casa

This application is built upon the Picasa Web Albums Data API provided and supported by Google Inc.

Ads are supplied to this application using the AdRotator component from a variety of third party vendors.

The displaying of Gifs was made possible by the work of the .NET Image Tools Development Group and their provided Image Tools library. The licence can be found at http://imagetools.codeplex.com/license.

This application uses SQLite to store data, which was made possible thanks to SQLite Portable Class Library. The licence can be found at https://sqlitepcl.codeplex.com/license.

Special thanks to the community of ModernUIIcons.com who provided some of the icons used within this application.

Sign in page background image was created by Josh Felise under the Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Licence.The original image can be found at Snapwire.
